attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In memory of two year old Casey Mullen brutally raped and murdered please set up a petition to protect chidren from paedophiles and at last let Sarah's Law become recognised. This would be a tribute to this innocent little girl.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action and not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
